sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>true</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1393996_scriptin_cconnectnow_practice</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_1393996_scriptin_cconnectnow_practice">related_incidentISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="related_incident" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Update Description</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	var related_incident = current.getValue("related_incident");
	gs.debug();
	var dec = new GlideRecord("incident");
	dec.addQuery("number","=",related_incident.number);
	dec.query();
	while(dec.next())
	{
		current.incident_short_description = dec.short_description;
		dec.update();
		gs.info(dec.short_description);
	}

	// Add your code here

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-08 07:09:26</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>a60f8241c35b861037d1b7ddd4013129</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Description</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Scripting_Training" source="x_1393996_scriptin">36a66608c35b421037d1b7ddd4013181</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Scripting_Training">36a66608c35b421037d1b7ddd4013181</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_a60f8241c35b861037d1b7ddd4013129</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-08 07:43:16</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before_display</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=a60f8241c35b861037d1b7ddd4013129"/></record_update>
